page.title: 18WICK COURT
page.content: The place of most historical interest is{Wick Court}which was built in the 13th century. It was originally a garrison for the army because it was on the top of{Barrow Hill}and a good vantage point. The house has a moat running round it and has its own colony of bats. In the grounds is an oak tree which is reputedly two thousand years old. The house itself is in a good state of repair having been owned by a private family. The last of the family died in the winter and now the house is going to be properly restored and opened to the public.
